metadata.title: CVE-2018-7191 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In the tun subsystem in the Linux kernel before 4.13.14, dev_get_valid_nameis not called before register_netdevice. This allows local users to cause adenial of service (NULL pointer dereference and panic) via anioctl(TUNSETIFF) call with a dev name containing a / character. This issimilar to CVE-2013-4343.

criterions.comment: linux package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
